title: Patching Problems. Please Help
body:
So I opened my  launcher couple days ago, and there was a patch. after completing step 1 it says unspecified error occurred. I tried repairing it still wont work, then I decided to re-install it again so I deleted all my files and download it again but after completing step 1, "unspecified error occurred" appears again.

What can I do? Please help me.
Thankyou

replies.body: If it's around step 1 then your settings could be blocking your game files from being accessed or updated.  You may want to start off with each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.
